item.title: Where would I add this?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Where would I add this? I am making a safezone. I am using RuneJava and following desiderâ€™s guide. I did this and got errors:

public void checkwildy() { if((absX >= 2806 && absX <= 2812 && absY >= 3438 && absY <= 3442)) { inwildy = false; } else { inwildy = true; } } if((absX >= 2684 && absX <= 2823 && absY >= 3400 && absY <= 3492)) { inwildy = false; } else { inwildy = true; } }

How would I connect that to make that 2nd set of coords a safezone too?

Compile error:

Compiling all RuneJava .java Files... client.java:6354: illegal start of expression public void checkwildy() { ^ client.java:6361: illegal start of type if((absX >= 2684 && absX <= 2823 && absY >= 3400 && absY <= 3492)) { ^ client.java:6361: <identifier> expected if((absX >= 2684 && absX <= 2823 && absY >= 3400 && absY <= 3492)) { ^ client.java:6361: <identifier> expected if((absX >= 2684 && absX <= 2823 && absY >= 3400 && absY <= 3492)) { ^ client.java:6361: <identifier> expected if((absX >= 2684 && absX <= 2823 && absY >= 3400 && absY <= 3492)) { ^ client.java:6361: <identifier> expected if((absX >= 2684 && absX <= 2823 && absY >= 3400 && absY <= 3492)) { ^ client.java:6363: illegal start of type } else { ^ 7 errors Press any key to continue . . .
